activities.loc: JCB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randy Lee Mayer

records.addlTxt: Jury trial - 12 person on December 16, 2022 at 08:00 am.

10:12 AM Defendant Randy Lee Mayer in court.  Attorney Matthew Dobbe in court for Randy Lee Mayer.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Reading of Information waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  JT 12/16/22 - Proposed Jury Instructions, Witness Lists, Verdict Forms, any Motions and Notice of Intent to Use Video are to be filed no later than 12/9/22.

3:30 PM Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Randy Lee Mayer appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew Dobbe appeared by video for Randy Lee Mayer. 3:32 Detective Jason Olson, Barron County Sheriff's Office, called, sworn, and direct by state.  3:34 Witness identifies DE.  3:37 Cross by defense. Court finds probable cause and binds DE over. Parties must appear in person to next hearing.
Arraignment scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 13, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

Must have no contact with C.G.

10:19 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Randy Lee Mayer in court.  Attorney Matthew Dobbe in court for Randy Lee Mayer. 
Set for preliminary hearing. May appear by zoom for prelim. Clerk to attach zoom information to the bond.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Initial appearance on June 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Initial appearance on June 10, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
and Demand for Discovery and Inspection.
Letter to Judge Babler from Attorney Dobbe re IA scheduled for 06/08/2022
